channel.title: Gauntlet Comics: Masks Bi-Monthly
channel.description:
![](upload://rOz6s5Cv32NQBmOFueYovAmlw7W.jpeg)
**For the first four months of 2020, I'm running an experiment.**
In January and February, I'll be running *Masks A New Generation* . This is an ENnie-award-winning superhero roleplaying game in which a team of young heroes fights villains, saves lives, and tries to figure out who they are—noble paragons? Dark avengers? Or regular kids? All against the backdrop of NEW GAUNTLET CITY, the greatest city in the world!
In March and April, I'm running Project Lycra, a superheroic PbtA game in playtest (written by my buddy Jen Kitzman). In Project Lycra, you'll be playing the adult versions of characters created in the previous Masks series (from Jan and Feb, the one I'm posting now)
If you're interested in making *most (not* ***all*** *, mind you, but most)* of my Tuesday night sessions, sign up! Being able to attend every session is not required, but it is preferred that you can make multiple sessions. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
---------------------------------------------------------------
This game is part of the ongoing Gauntlet Comics series. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the Gauntlet Comics canon (and on our wiki) for future miniseries.
This game session will be played on Zoom web conferencing. It will be recorded for future publication.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg) safety tool will be in use. Lines and Veils will be in place as well.
